attributes.action: Put the decision of the new digital ID card to a public vote like Brexit.
attributes.background: Thiers alot of concerns towards the new digital ID card the main concern is that it could could potentially become a form of control so that being said i feel that the best way forward is to put it to a public vote the public vote being final it on my seems right as it is directly affecting the us.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
